LABEL: 0x2A2
STRING: A fallen blade from the <Isle of Wind>.

LABEL: 0x2CE
STRING: I had a hard time believing that this was just a coincidence.

LABEL: 0x304
STRING: I couldn't help but think it was the effect of some kind of disaster up on the surface.

LABEL: 0x346
STRING: This ship had been triaged...

LABEL: 0x370
STRING: In an instant, a disturbing sense of urgency filled the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x475
STRING: 「No way...!」

LABEL: 0x493
STRING: 「Does that mean rescue isn't coming after all?!」

LABEL: 0x4E0
STRING: 「Calm down, Touri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x506
STRING: 「As we said, there's no way ROMLES would abandon <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x54E
STRING: 「I hate to say it, but it's like we're holding <Alice> hostage.」

LABEL: 0x5A0
STRING: 「So don't worry. Help is on the way.」

LABEL: 0x64F
STRING: Doubts were growing.

LABEL: 0x671
STRING: Rescue would come.

LABEL: 0x68B
STRING: That was what I wanted to believe, but it was far from certain.

LABEL: 0x6C1
STRING: Could we really rely on that hope alone?

LABEL: 0x740
STRING: 「Calm down, you idiots.」

LABEL: 0x769
STRING: Reiri cut them off in a low voice, showing no signs of panic.

LABEL: 0x79D
STRING: Her calm demeanor cooled Hiragino and Touri's mania slightly.

LABEL: 0x84B
STRING: 「Listen carefully.」

LABEL: 0x86D
STRING: 「The Argo float will reach the sea without issue.」

LABEL: 0x8AD
STRING: 「The operation to call for help itself didn't fail...」

LABEL: 0x8E9
STRING: 「The problem is, there's a possibility that we won't be able to wait around for rescue.」

LABEL: 0x931
STRING: 「In other words... there's no need to think any further about calling for help.」

LABEL: 0x9D2
STRING: 「Focus your thinking.」

LABEL: 0x9F9
STRING: Right――

LABEL: 0xA0F
STRING: There was only one thing we had to think about.

LABEL: 0xA3F
STRING: How to get out of here.

LABEL: 0xA5D
STRING: Instead of waiting for rescue, think of how to escape from the <SHEEP III>, trapped at the bottom of the sea...

LABEL: 0xB2B
STRING: ――Think.

LABEL: 0xB45
STRING: I had to think.

LABEL: 0xB5F
STRING: There should have been enough hints by now.

LABEL: 0xB93
STRING: Remember... Remember.

LABEL: 0xBBB
STRING: What had happened in the few days we'd spent here on the <SHEEP III>, and what had we used?

LABEL: 0xC06
STRING: What would help us escape――

LABEL: 0xCA5
STRING: ――The <Isle of Wind> floating on the surface of the sea.

LABEL: 0xD2C
STRING: ――The bridge dividing the <SHEEP III> in two, and the watertight doors.

LABEL: 0xDC9
STRING: ――Two pressure-resistant diving suits.

LABEL: 0xE4C
STRING: ――Triage.

LABEL: 0xED2
STRING: ――Buoyancy.

LABEL: 0xEEA
STRING: Several visions ran through my brain.

LABEL: 0xF1A
STRING: What had we been doing all this time――

LABEL: 0xF77
STRING: 「Hey, Katagiri-kun!!」

LABEL: 0x103E
STRING: Hiragino's words brought me back to my senses.

LABEL: 0x1062
STRING: Before I knew it, my dark, black, and distant vision was dyed in vivid colors.

LABEL: 0x1107
STRING: 「...ragino-san?」

LABEL: 0x113E
STRING: 「Are you okay? Stay with me.」

LABEL: 0x11D2
STRING: Hiragino was grabbing both of my shoulders and rocking me.

LABEL: 0x1261
STRING: He shook me back and forth――

LABEL: 0x128B
STRING: 「I-I'm fine. I'm fine.」

LABEL: 0x12B1
STRING: 「...Just, lost in thought.」

LABEL: 0x12D9
STRING: I was overthinking it.

LABEL: 0x12F3
STRING: My consciousness was fading even without me recalling the tragedy in the rear section...

LABEL: 0x135D
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x1377
STRING: I brushed off Hiragino's hands and took a deep breath to calm myself down.

LABEL: 0x13B3
STRING: Overthinking brought no results...

LABEL: 0x13F5
STRING: Silence filled the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x1417
STRING: Just a little more―we were almost there.

LABEL: 0x1441
STRING: There should be enough pieces, but they didn't fit.

LABEL: 0x1477
STRING: I didn't have enough ideas.

LABEL: 0x149F
STRING: The goal was right there, but I just couldn't see myself reaching it.

LABEL: 0x14E5
STRING: Don't rush... Take your time.

LABEL: 0x1515
STRING: Stay calm, look at what's in front of you, what's entering our ears――

LABEL: 0x1556
STRING: 「I guess it's no use.」

LABEL: 0x1585
STRING: 「Touri-kun...!」

LABEL: 0x15A8
STRING: Hiragino scolded Touri for her weakness.

LABEL: 0x15D2
STRING: However, her anxious voice didn't stop.

LABEL: 0x1672
STRING: 「I mean, we're all thinking, but we can't come up with an answer.」

LABEL: 0x1719
STRING: 「So, it's pointless to think about it!」

LABEL: 0x17E2
STRING: 「This ship... should just sink already.」

LABEL: 0x1829
STRING: 「Not another word!」

LABEL: 0x1893
STRING: Yukari reprimanded her sharply.

LABEL: 0x18BD
STRING: Touri fell silent.

LABEL: 0x18F3
STRING: However... this ship sinking――

LABEL: 0x191D
STRING: Sinking the <SHEEP III>――?

LABEL: 0x1946
STRING: 「Everyone...」

LABEL: 0x1962
STRING: 「Could you listen to what I have to say?」

LABEL: 0x1A5D
STRING: 「...What is it?」

LABEL: 0x1A8A
STRING: 「I can't be sure, but...」

LABEL: 0x1AAE
STRING: 「I'd like to hear what Yukari-san, who knows this ship well, and Tokiwa and Reiri have to say about this.」

LABEL: 0x1B0D
STRING: 「――Whether escape is possible with the method I'm about to tell you.」

LABEL: 0x1E96
STRING: 「We'll use the diving suits to get out.」

LABEL: 0x1EBE
STRING: In the end, that seemed the most orthodox and reasonable method.

LABEL: 0x1FA8
STRING: Chairs were arranged in a circle inside the wheelhouse, and we sat so that we could see each other's faces.

LABEL: 0x2002
STRING: Yukari, whose eyes met mine, opened her mouth.

LABEL: 0x2094
STRING: 「It will be possible to go underwater and withstand the water pressure.」

LABEL: 0x20D4
STRING: 「But, how do we gain buoyancy?」

LABEL: 0x210F
STRING: 「We have two diving suits.」

LABEL: 0x2131
STRING: 「The idea was rejected when we were talking earlier, but...」

LABEL: 0x2161
STRING: 「If you remove the weights from the two diving suits, wouldn't that create a decent amount of buoyancy?」

LABEL: 0x21C1
STRING: 「We haven't calculated it properly, but it should be enough to send a single person to the surface――」

LABEL: 0x2228
STRING: 「It's possible.」

LABEL: 0x2309
STRING: Tokiwa was sitting opposite of me.

LABEL: 0x2329
STRING: She pulled out the PDA she'd brought in from the library and presented it to me.

LABEL: 0x23E0
STRING: 「According to this data, if you removed the weights from the two diving suits...」

LABEL: 0x242A
STRING: 「...They can float up to about 60 kilograms.」

LABEL: 0x247F
STRING: 「But, wouldn't removing the weights lower the pressure resistance?」

LABEL: 0x24E0
STRING: 「Structure-wise, there will be no such problems.」

LABEL: 0x2519
STRING: 「It's a diving suit that can withstand a depth of 700 meters.」

LABEL: 0x2547
STRING: 「I don't think you're going to run into trouble that easily while surfacing.」

LABEL: 0x2591
STRING: ...I wonder.

LABEL: 0x25B3
STRING: It was a very simple and childish plan, but there shouldn't be any major problems.

LABEL: 0x25F9
STRING: If there was a problem――

LABEL: 0x2668
STRING: 「I don't know if it's a kraken or what, but we can't forget about that guy.」

LABEL: 0x26BF
STRING: 「Reiri...」

LABEL: 0x2745
STRING: 「That wire from the messenger buoy was――」

LABEL: 0x278C
STRING: She glanced at Yukari.

LABEL: 0x281A
STRING: 「...It seemed to have been cut off partway through, but...」

LABEL: 0x2864
STRING: 「The rest looked like it had been bitten off.」

LABEL: 0x28B2
STRING: 「We don't know what's out there in these waters, do we?」

LABEL: 0x290B
STRING: 「...Yes. There's no denying that.」

LABEL: 0x29F5
STRING: 「But unlike the buoy, there won't be any lights on.」

LABEL: 0x2A9C
STRING: 「A diving suit floating silently in the darkness―I wonder how it'll look to the eyes of the sea monsters?」

LABEL: 0x2B6A
STRING: 「Hey, that's a nasty way to put it.」

LABEL: 0x2BF5
STRING: 「But, you're right.」

LABEL: 0x2C2D
STRING: 「If we say that anything we'll send to the surface will get obstructed, nothing gets done.」

LABEL: 0x2C81
STRING: 「I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x2CA4
STRING: Reiri was jesting.

LABEL: 0x2CBE
STRING: Of course, the dangers she mentioned would always be present.

LABEL: 0x2CF6
STRING: Something the size of a diving suit could get swallowed whole by a giant monster...

LABEL: 0x2D4A
STRING: The chance was not zero.

LABEL: 0x2DA2
STRING: But, if there were no other dangers, wasn't it well worth considering?

LABEL: 0x2E00
STRING: First of all, the suit was designed on the premise of human life. It was sturdier than a buoy.

LABEL: 0x2E58
STRING: I looked around the circle.

LABEL: 0x2E7E
STRING: My eyes met those of the anxious-looking Touri.

LABEL: 0x2F14
STRING: 「I don't know how hard it is, but...」

LABEL: 0x2F46
STRING: 「That'll only help one person.」

LABEL: 0x2F83
STRING: 「That's right――」

LABEL: 0x2FA1
STRING: 「This method only saves one person.」

LABEL: 0x2FDB
STRING: 「Only one person can be saved... but the chances of success are quite high.」

LABEL: 0x3038
STRING: 「What about the rest of us?」

LABEL: 0x3065
STRING: 「We'll wait here for the first person to call a rescue team...」

LABEL: 0x30C4
STRING: 「Then...」

LABEL: 0x30E9
STRING: Touri shut her mouth.

LABEL: 0x311F
STRING: However, Touri was right.

LABEL: 0x3147
STRING: Ultimately, this method was no different from the previous ones.

LABEL: 0x3187
STRING: Instead of a messenger buoy or an Argo float, we'd send a person.

LABEL: 0x31D3
STRING: It was simply an attempt to reach out to the rescuers more directly.

LABEL: 0x3217
STRING: 「We'll save one, and the rest of us will wait for rescue. That's the first way.」

LABEL: 0x332E
STRING: 「...The first?」

LABEL: 0x3351
STRING: 「That's right. I have two ideas.」

LABEL: 0x337D
STRING: 「There's another way―a possibility that everyone will be saved.」

LABEL: 0x342F
STRING: 「Really?!」

LABEL: 0x3450
STRING: 「Yes. But... it's very risky.」

LABEL: 0x3488
STRING: 「I don't know if everyone will make it out alive. And...」

LABEL: 0x34C8
STRING: 「And if we fail, we can't take it back.」

LABEL: 0x35E1
STRING: 「...Let's just hear how it's done.」

LABEL: 0x3612
STRING: 「Right.」

LABEL: 0x3628
STRING: And so, I told them about my plan――

LABEL: 0x3954
STRING: 「――That's how it is.」

LABEL: 0x3974
STRING: The wheelhouse was dead silent.

LABEL: 0x3994
STRING: I didn't need to look around at their faces to see Hiragino with his head in his hands.

LABEL: 0x3A44
STRING: 「...That's insane.」

LABEL: 0x3A64
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun, you're not kidding... are you?」

LABEL: 0x3AA9
STRING: 「Oh, I'm dead serious.」

LABEL: 0x3B37
STRING: 「It doesn't matter if you're serious or not.」

LABEL: 0x3B6C
STRING: Was he exasperated or angry?

LABEL: 0x3B9A
STRING: His eyes darted around in confusion, unsure of where to start.

LABEL: 0x3C44
STRING: 「First of all, there's no way this ship could withstand such an impact, is there?」

LABEL: 0x3C8F
STRING: 「Due to the structure of the <SHEEP III>, the bridge is most likely weaker than the watertight doors when subjected to the same pressure.」

LABEL: 0x3CFE
STRING: 「If the bridge can't withstand it...」

LABEL: 0x3D2E
STRING: 「...Then there's no problem.」

LABEL: 0x3DC2
STRING: 「No problem? Are you kidding me?」

LABEL: 0x3DEC
STRING: 「Despite the structural differences, they're parts of the <SHEEP III> built in the same way.」

LABEL: 0x3E39
STRING: 「There's no guarantee that if there's a strong enough impact to break any part of the ship that the rest of it will remain intact.」

LABEL: 0x3EA8
STRING: 「Is that really true?」

LABEL: 0x3ED7
STRING: Tokiwa interrupted.

LABEL: 0x3EFB
STRING: With a small tilt of her head, she held both of her hands in the air.

LABEL: 0x400A
STRING: 「The principle of leverage... is not relevant, but...」

LABEL: 0x4049
STRING: 「The magnitude of the force, where the force is applied, the speed at which the force is applied, and so on.」

LABEL: 0x4095
STRING: 「It's how much power you put into it that will increase your chances.」

LABEL: 0x40DA
STRING: 「But what about the windows? They're acrylic, right?」

LABEL: 0x410C
STRING: 「They should have much lower resistance to impacts than the walls.」

LABEL: 0x4146
STRING: 「Remember the observation deck? It could be a repeat of that time.」

LABEL: 0x4193
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x4264
STRING: 「I... I'll explain!」

LABEL: 0x428A
STRING: 「Every window on the <SHEEP III> is a dummy.」

LABEL: 0x42CC
STRING: 「R-Really?」

LABEL: 0x435A
STRING: 「Yes. I've failed to mention it to you all this time, but...」

LABEL: 0x439B
STRING: Yukari spoke somewhat apologetically.

LABEL: 0x4439
STRING: 「This submarine, the <SHEEP III>, is designed to leak as little light as possible.」

LABEL: 0x449C
STRING: 「――That way, the light won't lure in anything unnecessary.」

LABEL: 0x45B1
STRING: 「Huh?! But, what's going on outside the windows...」

LABEL: 0x45FA
STRING: 「It's a real-time projection of footage taken by over a dozen cameras attached to the <SHEEP III's> hull.」

LABEL: 0x4665
STRING: 「The images in those small round windows are real, and even from a slightly different perspective,

LABEL: 0x46A9
STRING: they should be indistinguishable from the images of the deep sea, which we're not used to seeing.」

LABEL: 0x4703
STRING: 「If something unforeseen happens and we don't want people to see what's going on outside, we can just play a dummy video.」

LABEL: 0x47E3
STRING: 「I see... I didn't notice at all.」

LABEL: 0x4816
STRING: 「Same...」

LABEL: 0x4832
STRING: To think that that the windows were fake... I'd looked through them a few times, but I had never noticed it.

LABEL: 0x4890
STRING: As expected of ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x48CD
STRING: 「The only real windows are in the wheelhouse in the front and the observation deck in the rear.」

LABEL: 0x491D
STRING: 「They're both areas that naturally lose light when submerged. There was no problem with them staying that way.」

LABEL: 0x49E0
STRING: 「Therefore, in terms of durability against damage, the only thing on my mind is the wheelhouse...」

LABEL: 0x4A3D
STRING: 「Fortunately, the wheelhouse is in the exact opposite position of the direct impact.」

LABEL: 0x4A7F
STRING: 「In which case, I think it could be possible depending on how much force is applied.」

LABEL: 0x4AD9
STRING: 「...How about it?」

LABEL: 0x4B33
STRING: I asked again.

LABEL: 0x4B51
STRING: Hiragino and Yukari seemed unsatisfied, but they couldn't deny it.

LABEL: 0x4C92
STRING: 「I'm not following you at all. What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x4D52
STRING: 「Good grief. Were you listening to what we were talking about?」

LABEL: 0x4DF6
STRING: 「I was listening, but...」

LABEL: 0x4E27
STRING: 「Is this because of your inability to understand, or Katagiri's inability to explain...?」

LABEL: 0x4EBA
STRING: 「...Well, it's not a question of which is worse.」

LABEL: 0x4EFF
STRING: She left out quite a bit of her thoughts...

LABEL: 0x4F31
STRING: Reiri shrugged, making fun of me and her sister at the same time.

LABEL: 0x4FDD
STRING: 「If you're going to say that, then explain it to me, Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x5079
STRING: 「We're sinking it.」

LABEL: 0x5095
STRING: 「This ship, once more.」

LABEL: 0x5186
STRING: I don't get it. Be more specific!」

LABEL: 0x5225
STRING: 「Why do I have to do something like that...?」

LABEL: 0x5260
STRING: 「If you remove the outer walls, this ship has two pressure-resistant shells connected by a bridge.」

LABEL: 0x5385
STRING: 「The only reason this ship can't float is because one of the shells is completely submerged.」

LABEL: 0x53DB
STRING: 「Because it weighs us down.」

LABEL: 0x5417
STRING: 「So, if we cut off that one, then――」

LABEL: 0x54C4
STRING: 「That's what Katagiri-san suggested.」

LABEL: 0x54F5
STRING: Tokiwa explained on behalf of Reiri.

LABEL: 0x5521
STRING: Touri's eyes widened as she listened to her while nodding.

LABEL: 0x55C9
STRING: 「Cut it off? But that's... the rear section...」

LABEL: 0x5607
STRING: 「Y-You can do that?」

LABEL: 0x5636
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x5650
STRING: 「Ozone is still flowing into the sea.」

LABEL: 0x5682
STRING: 「I'll guide it between the pressure-resistant shell and the outer wall of the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x56CB
STRING: 「If we do that, the outside of the pressure-resistant shell will be filled with ozone.」

LABEL: 0x5777
STRING: 「Uh-huh.」

LABEL: 0x5796
STRING: 「If we set off an explosion in that state...」

LABEL: 0x57CC
STRING: 「First of all, one would imagine that the most fragile part of the <SHEEP III's> structure would be destroyed.」

LABEL: 0x5834
STRING: 「The most fragile part?」

LABEL: 0x5859
STRING: 「Yes... the bridge.」

LABEL: 0x587D
STRING: Destruction of the bridge by an ozone explosion.

LABEL: 0x58AB
STRING: Separation of the front and rear sections.

LABEL: 0x58D3
STRING: Both ends of the bridge were sealed by watertight doors,

LABEL: 0x5929
STRING: so if the front section was not damaged, water should not be able to enter the ship even if the bridge broke down.

LABEL: 0x5A03
STRING: 「If we can separate the pressure-resistant shells..」

LABEL: 0x5A3F
STRING: 「The <SHEEP III>... Or more accurately, the front section of it, could theoretically rise to the surface of the sea.」

LABEL: 0x5A94
STRING: 「Do you get it now? How ridiculous his idea is?」

LABEL: 0x5AED
STRING: 「Uh, yeah...」

LABEL: 0x5B10
STRING: Touri nodded back at Reiri, albeit modestly.

LABEL: 0x5B48
STRING: She stared at me with her eyes half-vacant and mouth half-open.

LABEL: 0x5BA3
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x5BC1
STRING: 「If I'm not mistaken, that sounds very dangerous...」

LABEL: 0x5C12
STRING: 「Well... yes.」

LABEL: 0x5C30
STRING: 「In the worst-case scenario, there's a chance we won't be able to escape.」

LABEL: 0x5C60
STRING: 「Considering the possibility of failure, and what could happen then...」

LABEL: 0x5CA6
STRING: 「I know I'm the one who suggested it, but there's no guarantee it'll succeed.」

LABEL: 0x5D72
STRING: Yes, there was a possibility of a failure.

LABEL: 0x5D96
STRING: It existed at all key points in this operation.

LABEL: 0x5DD8
STRING: What if an ozone explosion occurred right in the middle of guiding the ozone between the outer wall and the pressure-resistant shell?

LABEL: 0x5E2C
STRING: Even if we could make it explode safely, what if the bridge wasn't destroyed?

LABEL: 0x5E76
STRING: On the contrary, what if the front section took damage?

LABEL: 0x5EB8
STRING: What if, once safely separated, the impact of us surfacing wasn't properly suppressed?

LABEL: 0x5F0A
STRING: I couldn't deny the possibility of a serious mishap happening at each and every step.

LABEL: 0x5FBD
STRING: 「But if waiting isn't enough to save us...」

LABEL: 0x6001
STRING: 「I think we have no choice but to try.」

LABEL: 0x6039
STRING: This... was the only way to save everyone.

LABEL: 0x6082
STRING: 「Saving one person has a high chance of success.」

LABEL: 0x60B0
STRING: 「And even if the odds are low, there's a chance of saving everyone.」

LABEL: 0x60EB
STRING: The two choices――

LABEL: 0x6105
STRING: Perhaps from a third-party perspective, you could tell which was better, but...

LABEL: 0x6153
STRING: As a person involved, I couldn't possibly come up with an answer while my life was on the line――

LABEL: 0x62F2
STRING: 「...Does that mean we have to choose one?」

LABEL: 0x6330
STRING: 「Why don't we send someone off inside a diving suit,

LABEL: 0x635E
STRING: and try the other one after that?」

LABEL: 0x63C1
STRING: 「You're right.」

LABEL: 0x63DD
STRING: Why did I think we had to choose between them?

LABEL: 0x647F
STRING: 「That's right. That should be possible.」

LABEL: 0x64A9
STRING: 「Of course, in order to carry out the latter plan, we need to work outside the ship wearing a diving suit.」

LABEL: 0x64FB
STRING: 「If an accident were to occur during that work...」

LABEL: 0x6590
STRING: 「If that happens, we shall pray.」

LABEL: 0x65C3
STRING: Tokiwa joined her hands together in front of her chest and chanted, "Itadakimasu."

LABEL: 0x663D
STRING: For the third time, I looked over everyone's faces.

LABEL: 0x6669
STRING: 「Are we really going to do it?」

LABEL: 0x668D
STRING: 「We still have the option of waiting patiently for rescue.」

LABEL: 0x6747
STRING: 「The heating will run out eventually.」

LABEL: 0x6779
STRING: 「I don't know how long we'll be able to hold out after that.」

LABEL: 0x67C8
STRING: 「Besides, take a look.」

LABEL: 0x6809
STRING: Hiragino pointed toward the window.

LABEL: 0x682B
STRING: When I looked, I could see glimpses of white debris that wasn't there before.

LABEL: 0x694A
STRING: 「I don't know how long the collapse of the <Isle of Wind> has been going on, but...」

LABEL: 0x6992
STRING: 「I wouldn't say it's safe to just wait here.」

LABEL: 0x69DF
STRING: 「Go to your death or wait to die――」

LABEL: 0x6A6A
STRING: 「――Personally, I prefer the former.」

LABEL: 0x6A9D
STRING: That being the case, our hesitation vanished.

LABEL: 0x6B01
STRING: 「Got it.」

LABEL: 0x6B1B
STRING: 「――Let's get out of here, everyone.」

LABEL: 0x6DC2
STRING: 「The first and most important issue is controlling the ozone explosion.」

LABEL: 0x6EA1
STRING: Yukari stood up.

LABEL: 0x6EBF
STRING: She spoke in a dignified voice as she gathered the gazes of everyone in the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x6F65
STRING: 「We're going to pull the cable that supplies the sea with ozone to the ship.」

LABEL: 0x6FB1
STRING: 「If there's an explosion in the middle of that,

LABEL: 0x6FF1
STRING: or if we can't remotely trigger the explosion at the right time,

LABEL: 0x703B
STRING: then the operation won't work in the first place.」

LABEL: 0x706C
STRING: Yukari explained it clearly.

LABEL: 0x7090
STRING: However, she wasn't exaggerating.

LABEL: 0x70BE
STRING: It was an operation that was fraught with danger.

LABEL: 0x70F4
STRING: We needed to reduce the uncertainty as much as possible...

LABEL: 0x71B2
STRING: 「An ozone explosion, in other words...」

LABEL: 0x71D8
STRING: 「This phenomenon occurs when ozone (O3) is converted to oxygen (O2) instantly, triggered by an ignition.」

LABEL: 0x723E
STRING: 「I think we need to adjust the concentration to an optimal level to ensure a reliable explosion.」

LABEL: 0x7290
STRING: 「Reiri-san, do you know what the optimal concentration is?」

LABEL: 0x72CB
STRING: Reiri, who had been looking out of the window without a care in the world, answered readily.

LABEL: 0x73E0
STRING: 「...If you go past 40vol%%, you'll get a chain reaction.」

LABEL: 0x741B
STRING: 「However, if the purity is too high, the explosion will be suppressed.」

LABEL: 0x74C6
STRING: 「Actually... I don't think you need me to tell you.」

LABEL: 0x7506
STRING: 「Don't mess with me, kimono.」

LABEL: 0x75A8
STRING: 「Unfortunately, I've been asleep for seven years.」

LABEL: 0x763B
STRING: 「I was anxious to see if things had changed in the meantime.」

LABEL: 0x76FD
STRING: 「The formula for chemical reactions won't change that easily.」

LABEL: 0x77A5
STRING: 「Oh, but science is always being updated.」

LABEL: 0x77E5
STRING: 「Even Newton's equations were――」

LABEL: 0x7844
STRING: 「This is the 21st century.」

LABEL: 0x7871
STRING: 「It was the 21st century seven years ago too, right?」

LABEL: 0x7906
STRING: 「...Hey, somebody do something.」

LABEL: 0x7943
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san, Reiri-san, thank you very much.」

LABEL: 0x797F
STRING: 「We'll measure the concentration as we pull the cable to the ship.」

LABEL: 0x79D2
STRING: Yukari quickly stepped in before things escalated further between the two.

LABEL: 0x7A09
STRING: I mean, these two were simply incompatible, regardless of what happened with Hikari...

LABEL: 0x7A56
STRING: While Tokiwa's inability to read the air was the main cause, Reiri's short temper was also a problem.

LABEL: 0x7AA2
STRING: ...She rarely slept to the point of using stimulants, and dedicated all her time to research.

LABEL: 0x7B3D
STRING: 「Haaaaaah.」

LABEL: 0x7B5E
STRING: Reiri let out an impatient sigh suddenly like she was exhausted.

LABEL: 0x7B9C
STRING: Tokiwa waited for Yukari's next words without seeming to notice.

LABEL: 0x7CB5
STRING: 「Now, next...」

LABEL: 0x7CE8
STRING: 「What should we do about the ignition?」

LABEL: 0x7D0A
STRING: 「Like Momoi said, we need to set it off remotely, but...」

LABEL: 0x7D4A
STRING: 「There's nothing convenient like a detonator around――」

LABEL: 0x7D97
STRING: 「We just need to build a remote detonator.」

LABEL: 0x7DCC
STRING: Reiri turned away, seemingly uninterested, and answered.

LABEL: 0x7E0C
STRING: You say it like it's a simple thing――

LABEL: 0x7F18
STRING: 「That's an easy thing to say...」

LABEL: 0x7F59
STRING: 「It is easy. If we disassemble the PDAs in the library, we can at least make a simple bomb, right?」

LABEL: 0x7FAA
STRING: 「As I said earlier, as long as the appropriate ozone concentration is achieved, the initial ignition itself can be small.」

LABEL: 0x806D
STRING: 「You can leave that to me.」

LABEL: 0x8094
STRING: Reiri muttered to herself.

LABEL: 0x80C4
STRING: ...How reliable.

LABEL: 0x80EC
STRING: Reiri... Was nothing impossible for her?

LABEL: 0x81F6
STRING: 「Reiri-san...!」

LABEL: 0x826B
STRING: 「You're amazing! Even more than I thought!」

LABEL: 0x82B0
STRING: 「I think you have a talent for terrorism!」

LABEL: 0x8354
STRING: 「Are you trying to pick a fight? I'll give you one if that's what you want.」

LABEL: 0x8410
STRING: 「How rude! I was just praising your talent!」

LABEL: 0x8461
STRING: 「Tch.」

LABEL: 0x847C
STRING: Reiri glared bitterly at Yukari.

LABEL: 0x84A0
STRING: It looked like she was telling her to do something about Tokiwa as soon as possible.

LABEL: 0x8510
STRING: However, Yukari continued the discussion while feigning ignorance.

LABEL: 0x85B0
STRING: 「Well then, let's leave the remote detonator to Reiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x85F8
STRING: 「All that's left... is the cable retrieval part.」

LABEL: 0x863C
STRING: 「No matter how skilled Tokiwa-san is, using the manipulator isn't realistic.」

LABEL: 0x86AB
STRING: 「I must admit it... reluctantly.」

LABEL: 0x86DF
STRING: 「I'm inexperienced...」

LABEL: 0x8710
STRING: Tokiwa sank dejectedly.

LABEL: 0x8734
STRING: However, her skill at catching marine creatures and retrieving Argo floats was impressive.

LABEL: 0x8794
STRING: I chose to remain silent, however, because I felt like she would get carried away if I didn't.

LABEL: 0x87EF
STRING: 「Retrieving the cable...」

LABEL: 0x8872
STRING: 「It's dangerous, of course, but I believe it would be safest to do it by human hands――」

LABEL: 0x88C5
STRING: 「――I'll go.」

LABEL: 0x88E7
STRING: ...I didn't hesitate one bit.

LABEL: 0x8975
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x8998
STRING: 「I've been out there once already.」

LABEL: 0x89C8
STRING: 「This isn't my first time wearing a diving suit, so I'm pretty used to it.」

LABEL: 0x8A0E
STRING: 「It's going to require precision work, right?」

LABEL: 0x8A40
STRING: 「It makes the most sense for me to go.」

LABEL: 0x8AF4
STRING: 「...Understood.」

LABEL: 0x8B73
STRING: 「Well then, Katagiri-san... We'll leave it to you.」

LABEL: 0x8BC6
STRING: And so――

LABEL: 0x8BE6
STRING: ――Once again, I was heading to the bottom of the sea.
